metadata.synopsis: |Zevlor's default dialog need a timeline context, so this dialog here is used as a transition when Zevlor is walking back to his default spot after a big event happened in the Grove. There's 2 cases: after the raiding party and after druid attack.|

0.speaker: Zevlor
0.text: Find me in the caves. I need to let people know we're moving.
0.context:
InternalNodeContext: Player clicks on Zevlor while he is getting back to his default position in the cave after the confrontation.
When Zevlor finally reaches the cave, his dialog is switched to DEN_TieflingLeader

1.speaker: Zevlor
1.text: Hm? Come introduce yourself in the caves. I need to get people moving.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The player can avoid DenIntro by progressing into the caves without talking to Zevlor
